subHeadingSubTitle: Elevate your AI experience: explore our suite of virtual solutions.

cardset1.textCardp1: AI-Lens uses advanced computer vision techniques for real time monitoring of PPE kit detection. It enhances workplace safety by automating the identification of correct gear usage and ensuring compliance, reducing the risk of accidents and injuries.
cardset1.textCardp2: Detect usage of Personal Fall Arrest System is used (PFAS) like a full body harness for wok-sites that are situated at heights along with other anti-fall protective gear.
cardset1.textCardp3: The compliance of head-mounted industrial PPE by using deep learning object detectors

cardset2.textCardp1: Efficient parking management guides drivers to available spaces, reducing congestion. Occupancy sensors streamline building navigation by communicating real-time space utilization.
cardset2.textCardp2: Machine area control, facilitated by AI-LENS, ensures safe distances between workers and machinery. Enforcing worker counts in designated areas enhances safety, especially for lone workers facing unique hazards.
cardset2.textCardp3: AI-based intrusion detection monitors restricted zones, triggering real-time alerts for swift responses to unauthorized access. This comprehensive zone management approach prioritizes safety, efficiency, and security in diverse workplace scenarios.

cardset3.textCardp2: We can  identify when a worker has fallen or is incapacitated in an industrial setting, enabling rapid response and potentially saving lives by reducing response time to emergencies.

cardset4.textCardp1: Let AI-LENS help you to detect and respond to spark, dust, and gas hazards in real-time, enhancing safety and environmental monitoring
cardset4.textCardp2: AI-based spark, dust, and gas detection systems offer enhanced safety, accuracy, and efficiency in industrial settings, reducing risks and costs while improving overall operational performance.
cardset4.textCardp3: These systems are a crucial component of modern safety measures in industries where such hazards are prevalent.

about_us_subtitle: Please reach us at aivision@ai-lens.ai to know us better!

aboutCard1.textCardp1: Employing sophisticated algorithms, we intricately enhance safety compliance measures, ensuring a notable improvement in overall workplace safety across industries like manufacturing, construction, and mining.
aboutCard1.textCardp2: These advanced systems contribute to a heightened level of operational safety, adhering rigorously to regulations and minimizing risks in diverse work environments.

aboutCard2.textCardp1: AI-LENS can provide safety solutions in a wide range of industries, helping to enhance worker safety, protect assets, and prevent accidents.
aboutCard2.textCardp2: In various industries such as manufacturing, construction, and oil and gas, the integration of artificial intelligence has proven instrumental in enhancing safety measures and operational efficiency. In manufacturing, AI systems monitor equipment for malfunctions, ensure worker safety compliance, and optimize production processes to minimize workplace accidents.
aboutCard2.textCardp3: Similarly, in construction, AI analyzes sites for safety compliance, identifies potential hazards, and tracks the movement of workers and heavy machinery to prevent accidents. In the oil and gas sector, AI technologies monitor pipelines, drilling operations, and refineries for safety adherence, detect gas leaks, and predict equipment failures, thereby preempting catastrophic accidents.

aboutCard3.textCardTitle: What sets AI-LENS apart from its competitors?
aboutCard3.textCardp1: By seamlessly integrating with existing cameras within facilities, AI-LENS  enabling early identification of potential hazards and preventing incidents before they occur.
